input_text.Prompt:
Product specification:
IRWIN Tools VISE-GRIP Pliers, High-Leverage Combination, 1000-Volt Insulated, 7-inch (10505873NA)

Product keywords:
Can ream and smooth inside and outside of conduit
Ideal for liquid tight fittings and caps
IRWIN VISE-GRIP pliers tighten
Constructed from durable nickel chromium steel, Machined jaws deliver maximum gripping strength.
Anti-pinch, non-slip ProTouch Grips provide comfort, control, and less hand fatigue. Handles are Red and Yellow, the international color denoting safety.
The Irwin Tools 10505873NA- 7" Insulated Combination - High Leverage is rated up to 1000V and meet ASTM, IEC, VDE and DIN specifications.
Slim profile nose reaches into tight areas and grips firmly strong, hardened gripper teeth.
pliers are designed to Securely grips and cuts work pieces

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Irwin Tools VISE-GRIP Pliers, High-Leverage Combination, 1000-Volt Insulated, 7-inch (10505873NA) are designed to secure and cut work pieces. The set of pliers uses hardened gripper teeth to firmly grip and smooth out work pieces. The pliers are great for liquid tight fittings and caps. They can also ream and smooth inside and outside of conduit. The slim profile nose reaches into tight areas and grips firmly. handles are Red and Yellow, the international color denoting safety. The IRWIN VISE-GRIP pliers tighten down on work pieces with tremendous force. The set of pliers are constructed from durable nickel chromium steel. Machined jaws deliver maximum gripping strength. Anti-pinch, non-slip ProTouch Grips provide comfort, control, and less hand fatigue. The handles are made of a fire-resistant material. The pliers are designed to meet the highest quality and safety standards.
input_text.Response B: The Irwin Tools 10505873NA- 7" Insulated Combination - High Leverage is ideal for liquid tight fittings and caps. The slim profile nose reaches into tight areas and grips firmly strong, hardened gripper teeth. The machined jaws deliver maximum gripping strength. The pliers are constructed from durable nickel chromium steel. The anti-pinch, non-slip ProTouch Grips provide comfort, control, and less hand fatigue. The handles are Red and Yellow, the international color denoting safety. These pliers are designed to Securely grips and cuts work pieces. Can ream and smooth inside and outside of conduit.

label_annotations.factors_a: Some sentences in response A did not make sense as it tries to mix and match parts of sentences from the original text.
label_annotations.feedback: Response B is clear and concise.
